GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: force data bouncing when backend is untrusted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit cbbd2d2531539212ff090aecbea9877c996e6ce6. For more details please see the references link.
